LineSensor

public LineSensor(SensorPort port,
                  int lineSensorRefresh,
                  double distanceFromRotationCenter,
                  double angleFromHeading)
Uses the LightSensor Position as input for a future implementation of LineListener, as well as for OdometryCorrector.

Parameters:
port - light sensor port
lineSensorRefresh -
distanceFromRotationCenter -
angleFromHeading - smallest angle between Storm Chaser heading and light sensor orientation.

timedOut

public void timedOut()
Compares the differences in the RAW values read from the light sensor to determine if a line has been read.
